title: FIRST ESSAY
content:
**The Reason Why I Create**

*I will be very envious when i see people have their own pages.*

*I would also appreciate those people are excellently competent.*

*So, i try to do it myself and use it to record my life, study and work.*

*This is an interesting and meaningful work for me and i like it.*

**What Shall I Do Next**

*Read a lot and post about it*

*Learn to code and pass on the experience*

*Say something about mathematics comprehension*

**Expectation**

*I want to know you and please contact me if you are obsessed with code*

*Learn and grow by sharing*

The world is better

**Thanks for reading!!**
